about_the_game:
SERIALGAMES – LivingGoodCity Tileset – Small Zoo Set depicts a small zoo located on the outskirts of town.

Experience the peaceful atmosphere of a small zoo with hamsters, squirrels, penguins, capybaras, elephants, and more adorable creatures. Each animal features animated walking sequences and can be freely placed within the zoo.

Included in the pack is a B1 tile sheet and walking animations for the animals.
Additionally, three distinct scene patterns—day, evening, and night—to add further depth to your creations. Unleash your creativity by crafting unique scenarios with these versatile assets!

With variations for "day, evening, and night," you can craft dynamic scenes that evolve over time.
You can expand your world-building possibilities further by seamlessly integrating this set with the "SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset."

■Included assets

Tile B (3 sheets in total with day, evening and night patterns)
　Zoo entrance, fences, stumps, flower beds, water fountains, trees, water features, benches, etc.
7 animal walking graphics
Sample map (project data) included

--------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
